sentence.Network_en: Timeliness is important as it defines the response - time criterion in advance of the system's implementation.
sentence.Network_cn: 及时性很重要,因为它规定了先于系统运行作出反应的时间标准.

sentence.Network_en: In journalism, timeliness and accuracy should be equally important.
